taxon.author: Ovtsharenko & Marusik, 1988
taxon.distribution: Russia (South to north-east Siberia, Far East)

referenceObject.reference: Ovtsharenko, V. I. & Marusik, Y. M. (1988). Spiders of the family Gnaphosidae (Aranei) of the north-east of the USSR (the Magadan Province). Entomologicheskoe Obozrenie 67: 204-217.
